values: 虚弱的；无力的；体弱的；不牢固的；懦弱的；无判断力的；无影响力的；无权力的；（价格）疲软的；萧条的；不擅长的；无说服力的；（光、热或声音）微弱的；无活力的；无生气的；（饮品）稀的；（脸的部分）瘦小的；（容貌）不突出的；无效力的；没有吸引力的；（动词）弱的；规则的；非重读的；（文体的）松散的；马虎的；弱电解的；弱电解质的

synonym.mean: 疲软的；虚弱的；无力的；不牢固的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 虚弱地；无力地；软弱地；有病地

word_mean_info__list.difference: 可与frail换用，但语气强，侧重脆弱，指人容易生病，指物容易破碎。
普通用词，指缺乏应有的力量，可用于身体、意志或精神。
多指因经常生病而身体纤弱。
指身体衰弱无力，精力几乎耗尽，含令人怜悯的意味。

word_group.brief_definition: 被（强烈感情，尤指欲望）屈服
心灵愿意；肉体软弱；心有余而力不足
word_group.phrase: the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak

word_group.brief_definition: 弱者；无用的人；靠不住的人
薄弱的法律；无力的法律权威；弱法
苍白虚弱；苍白衰弱；苍白无力

bilingual.source: He wore a brace to support his weak ankles.
bilingual.target: 他戴了一个支架来支撑他虚弱的脚踝。

bilingual.source: His malnutrition was evident from his weak appearance.
bilingual.target: 他的营养不良从他虚弱的外表上显而易见。

bilingual.source: And no apps means a weak platform.
bilingual.target: 没有应用意味着一个虚弱的平台。

bilingual.source: She was making a soft, weak sound.
bilingual.target: 她发出一种轻轻的、虚弱的声音。

bilingual.source: And a weak body gets sick easily.
bilingual.target: 而虚弱的身体很容易生病。

bilingual.source: The weak speaker made a speech on the bleak peak.
bilingual.target: 虚弱的讲话者在荒凉的山峰上发表了演说。

bilingual.source: Sometimes the difficulties come from a weak organ .
bilingual.target: 有时候困难来自一个虚弱的器官。

bilingual.source: A tired body meansa weak body. And a weak body gets sick easily.
bilingual.target: 疲惫的身体是虚弱的，而虚弱的身体很容易生病。

bilingual.source: Kangaroos and koala bears give birth to very small and weak young.
bilingual.target: 袋鼠和考拉熊产非常幼小虚弱的幼子.

list.abstract: weak_ptr是为配合shared_ptr而引入的一种智能指针。

yingyinNormal.en: We have to evolve. There's no room for the weak.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们必须进化，没有空间留给弱者。

yingyinNormal.en: Durotan. Your clan was weak, and you are a traitor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杜隆坦，你的族人软弱，而你还是一个叛徒。

yingyinNormal.en: Alone, we are weak. Together, we're a global power.
yingyinNormal.zh: 单枪匹马，我们不堪一击，团结起来，我们凝聚全世界的力量。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Oh, of course, it only works on the weak-minded.
yingyinNormal.zh: 干啥？难怪呢，只有意志薄弱的人才会被操控。

yingyinNormal.en: And who decides who's weak? Life. Life always decides.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁决定谁是弱者？生命，一直是生命决定。

yingyinNormal.en: You investigated him. Where's the weak link? Remy Danton.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你调查过他，突破点在哪里？雷米·丹顿。

yingyinNormal.en: Through our intelligence, we, weak humanity, became really very strong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正因为智慧，弱小的人类变得强大了。

yingyinNormal.en: And because ever since you stopped dieting, I have felt weak. Oh, no, I was weak.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为自从你停止节食，我就感觉自己意志薄弱。不对，我本来就意志薄弱。

yingyinNormal.en: The same! I apologize for him. He is weak. I am not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 完全一样！我为他道歉，他很怂，但是我不。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Will. You stop it! I don't like it when you're weak.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是，威尔。少装了！我不喜欢你楚楚可怜的样子。

yingyinNormal.en: Have you always been weak? Oh, no. I've never been sick before.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你一直身体不好？哦，不，我以前从没生过病。

yingyinNormal.en: I must show them their Khan. You are concerned you are seen as weak.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我必须让大家见到自己的大汗。你是怕别人将你视作弱者。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't worry. You're small and weak. That'll make you less of a target.
yingyinNormal.zh: 放心，你太瘦弱，绝对不会是攻击的目标。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you too weak to talk, destroyer? The Horde has no use for weakness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是虚弱到不能说话了吗，毁灭者？弱者在我们部落一无是处。

yingyinNormal.en: But he's weak. He's living off the unicorns. Don't you see? We had it wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他很虚弱，靠独角兽的血活命，还不明白？我们错了。

yingyinNormal.en: The world is changing. There's a reason why aristocrats developed weak chins.
yingyinNormal.zh: 世界正在改变。贵族们都长着短小下巴是有原因的。

yingyinNormal.en: Your son is gone. He was weak and foolish like his father. So I destroyed him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你儿子已经死了，他跟他的父亲一样虚弱又愚蠢，所以我毁了他。

yingyinNormal.en: It'd be way too easy to say Stan preys on the weak simply because he's a dick.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斯坦欺负弱小只因为他是个蠢蛋，这么解释太简单了。

yingyinNormal.en: Stay floppy, and you're not going to move or say a word. You're too weak, okay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 要一直假装病怏怏的，你不能动，也不能说一句，因为你太虚弱了，懂吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Keep talking while you can. Sure. You got a conscience, and that makes you weak.
yingyinNormal.zh: 趁你还能说话就说吧。好啊，有良心你就会变得软弱。

exam_freq_info.chinese: [语言学]轻读的; 非重读的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 衰弱；虚弱；薄弱；弱点；缺点；嗜好；癖好；宠爱；受宠爱的人；受宠爱的东西
v. 使虚弱；削弱；减弱；变弱

word_family.mean: adj. 无力的；缺少体力（精力）的；虚弱无力的；易破的；易倒塌的；易坏的；微弱的；词尾变化的；弱的；无说服力的

examination_example.sentence: Evidence either way is <highlight>weak</highlight>, relying on contrived laboratory tests or sometimes unreliable self-reports.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论哪种方法的证据都很薄弱，都依赖于人为策划的实验室检测，或有时不可靠的自我报告。

examination_example.sentence: He analyzes the <highlight>weak</highlight> lecture, learning lessons for the future about what works and what doesn't.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他会分析这次不成功的演讲，哪些地方可取，哪些不可取，为将来的演讲积累经验。

examination_example.sentence: Most journals are <highlight>weak</highlight> in statistical review, and this damages the quality of what they publish.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数期刊都不擅长统计评审，这损害了它们所发表内容的质量。

sense_info_list.en: easy to influence; not having much power
used when there is no stress on the word
sense_info_list.zh: [语言学]轻读的; 非重读的

sense_info_list.en: (of prices or a market) having a downward tendency; not financially strong or successful
that cannot support a lot of weight; likely to break

word_usage.usage: weak作形容词，可用于名词之前，修饰该名词，如：a weak heart，也可用于系动词之后，如：She is still weak after her illness. 她病后身体仍然虚弱。
weak前面加the，表示“弱者；穷人”一类人，作主语时，其谓语动词一般用复数形式，如：The weak are need to be protected. 弱者需要保护。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 易受影响的; 懦弱的; 软弱无力的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 衰弱；虚弱；薄弱；弱点；缺点；嗜好；癖好；宠爱；受宠爱的人；受宠爱的东西
v. 使虚弱；削弱；减弱；变弱

word_family.mean: adj. 无力的；缺少体力（精力）的；虚弱无力的；易破的；易倒塌的；易坏的；微弱的；词尾变化的；弱的；无说服力的

sense_info_list.en: easy to influence; not having much power
sense_info_list.zh: 易受影响的; 懦弱的; 软弱无力的

examination_example.sentence: That the UK lags behind is due to our <highlight>weak</highlight>, by international standards, local government, as well as the opposition to taxes .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国之所以落后，是因为按照国际标准，我们的地方政府软弱无力，以及对税收的反对。

examination_example.sentence: Striking the <highlight>weaker</highlight> enemy first.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 先攻击弱小的敌人。

examination_example.sentence: But, instead, the Chicago union seems to be using its political capital primarily to protect <highlight>weak</highlight> performers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，相反，芝加哥工会似乎主要利用其政治资本来保护表现不佳的人。

sense_info_list.en: (of prices or a market) having a downward tendency; not financially strong or successful

examination_example.sentence: In the years that followed, conventional retailers' confidence in the future increased as Census continued to report <highlight>weak</highlight> online sales.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在接下来的几年里，随着人口普查继续报告网络销售疲软，传统零售商对未来的信心增强。

examination_example.sentence: However, Fortune says the <highlight>weakest</highlight> of the malls have closed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，《财富》杂志称，（经济）最萧条的商场已经关闭。

examination_example.sentence: Therefore, by definition, they had a much <highlight>weaker</highlight> English vocabulary than the native speakers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，根据定义，他们的英语词汇比母语为英语的人弱得多。

examination_example.sentence: How does one figure out who is a <highlight>weak</highlight> teacher?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们要怎么辨别谁是差老师呢？

examination_example.sentence: At best there is a <highlight>weak</highlight> statistical association and not a causal link between DNA and intelligence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 充其量，DNA和智力之间只有微弱的统计关联，没有因果联系。

word_usage.usage:
be weak in 表示“在...方面差”。
示例：他的视力和听力都很差。
误 He is weak at sight and hearing.
正 He is weak in sight and hearing.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 易受影响的; 懦弱的; 软弱无力的
(文章/论据)站不住脚的; 不成立的

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: What didn't kill them made them <highlight>weaker</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有摧毁他们的东西会让他们变得更弱。

examination_example.sentence: Even though Wang tried to account for this by culling the <highlight>weakest</highlight> winners, it's impossible to know which of the winners would have quit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管王教授试图通过剔除最弱的赢家来解释这一点，但我们不可能知道哪些赢家会退出。

examination_example.sentence: Wang selected the most determined, passionate scientists from the loser group and culled (剔除) what he deemed the <highlight>weakest</highlight> members of the winner group.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 王大顺从失败者组中挑选出最坚定、最有热情的科学家，并剔除了他认为胜利者组中最弱的成员。

sense_info_list.zh: (文章/论据)站不住脚的; 不成立的

examination_example.sentence: "Small does not mean <highlight>weak</highlight>, sir," she defended herself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “小并不意味着软弱，先生，”她为自己辩护。

examination_example.sentence: Our senses are <highlight>weak</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的感官很弱。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 不牢固的; 易损坏的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 衰弱；虚弱；薄弱；弱点；缺点；嗜好；癖好；宠爱；受宠爱的人；受宠爱的东西

word_family.mean: adj. 无力的；缺少体力（精力）的；虚弱无力的；易破的；易倒塌的；易坏的；微弱的；词尾变化的；弱的；无说服力的

examination_example.sentence: Lisa used to be very <highlight>weak</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 丽萨过去很虚弱。

examination_example.sentence: He looked very <highlight>weak</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他看上去很虚弱。

examination_example.sentence: At present, the girl is able to support the home with her <highlight>weak</highlight> shoulder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前，女孩已经可以用她虚弱的肩膀支撑整个家了。

examination_example.sentence: With the help of the telescope, we can receive <highlight>weaker</highlight> and more radio messages far away in space.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在望远镜的帮助下，我们可以在遥远的太空中接收到更弱、更多的无线电信息。

examination_example.sentence: Radio wavelengths are much longer than those of visible light, and the radio waves from deep space are always <highlight>weak</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无线电波的波长比可见光的波长长得多，而且来自外太空的无线电波总是很微弱。

examination_example.sentence: The bigger dish will be able to pick up <highlight>weaker</highlight> signals (信号).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 较大的天线盘能够接收到较弱的信号。

examination_example.sentence: Some are good at sports but <highlight>weak</highlight> in learning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人擅长运动，但学习能力差。

examination_example.sentence: The state of Qin became <highlight>weaker</highlight> and <highlight>weaker</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 秦国国力越来越弱。

examination_example.sentence: Young people's <highlight>weak</highlight> living abilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年轻人的生活能力很弱。

sense_info_list.en: that cannot support a lot of weight; likely to break
sense_info_list.zh: 不牢固的; 易损坏的

examination_example.sentence: In winter, the flowers and trees in the garden became dry and <highlight>weak</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 冬天，花园里的花草树木变得干枯而且非常脆弱。

examination_example.sentence: Their bones get <highlight>weaker</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的骨头变得脆弱。

word_usage.usage:
be weak in 表示“在...方面差”。
示例：他的视力和听力都很差。
误 He is weak at sight and hearing.
正 He is weak in sight and hearing.
